participant_1.name: Arjun
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and free-spirited, Arjun enjoys exploring new ideas and experiences, often contrasting with his traditional upbringing.
participant_1.background: my favorite music genre is death metal. i'm a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Introverted and creative, Liam thrives in his own world, often preferring to engage in digital interactions rather than face-to-face.
participant_2.background: i helped design the game starcraft. i've an allergy to water. i am a recluse. i'm a famous twitch streamer. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double.
